description: A couple navigates a mundane car wash environment, receiving sprays of water and passing under a large brush. However, in the back seat, a monstrous green creature reacts with discomfort to the washing process. The driver excitedly points towards the creature, alerting his passenger to its distress as if it were a recurring, expected phenomenon. The absurdity lies in the focus on the creature's reaction to the water rather than its presence as a passenger. This juxtaposes the ordinary setting with a surreal passenger, highlighting the peculiar priorities of the occupants.
caption: "Quick, Agnes! Look! ... There it is again!"
